last_episode_to_air.name: Adios, Muchachos
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Sal has his day in court — again — Willy decides to go his own way. After two decades, can the government finally make the charges stick?

name: Cocaine Cowboys: The Kings of Miami
original_name: Cocaine Cowboys: The Kings of Miami
overview: Two childhood friends go from high school dropouts to the most powerful drug kingpins in Miami in this true story of a crime sage that spanned decades.

episodes.name: Willy & Sal
episodes.overview: In the 1970s and '80s, friends Willy Falcon and Sal Magluta leave humble beginnings behind as they allegedly ascend to the top of Miami's drug trade.

episodes.name: 75 Tons
episodes.overview: As the authorities close in, the "Cowboys" are left with three options: flee, flip or face the music. But Willy and Sal won't go down so easily.

episodes.name: Mountain of Evidence
episodes.overview: As their high-profile trial begins, Willy and Sal attempt to neutralize witnesses against them in a variety of ways — some legal, others not so much.

episodes.name: Only in Miami
episodes.overview: In the wake of a stunning verdict, questions arise about the jury's credibility, and one juror in particular soon adopts a very creative legal defense.

episodes.name: Femme Fatale
episodes.overview: Sal takes uncharacteristically desperate measures in the face of new federal charges, an unearthed paper trail and increasing pressure on a confidant.

episodes.name: Adios, Muchachos
episodes.overview: As Sal has his day in court — again — Willy decides to go his own way. After two decades, can the government finally make the charges stick?
